pageContent:
<path>Update your subreddit app version</path>
## Update your subreddit app version
Currently, apps on a subreddit need to be manually updated when a new version is published.
-   Go to your "app details" page in developers.reddit.com and locate the subreddit you want to update.
-   If a new version of the app is available, an "Upgrade" button will be visible. Click this to update your app.
